title: Is There Really Such a Lack of Players on OCE?
body:
I realise currently it's midnight in Straya, and sure, I'm in queue for Ascension, but I've been trying to play for a solid hour now, and currently re-made my queue twice. 
Is OCE really this dead? Even the Boards are arid like a desert. 

73 ping is fairly high for connecting to servers within the same continent, but waaaaaaaay better than the currently absurd 300-360ms ping on NA, but the play-ability isn't much of a consideration when you can't even bloody play the game!

___

Also, on a side note, in just the past 2 or 3 weeks, my ping on NA servers has been absurd like I said, going so high as to be 360, consistently, before I'd be fine sitting at 250ms, then it started to pick up to 280 at the very least (which didn't seem like much of a difference, but I guess it would have marginally), but now it's actually difficult to play the game at such high ping.

replies.body:
TBH I think it's mostly due to you being level 14, but I'm sure OCE's smaller population is playing a small role here too. There are very few players around level 14, so obviously the matchmaking system is struggling to find people around your elo, and as a result you're spending 15 min in queue.

Once you level up to level 25+, things should start to get A LOT better ;)

Probably something else that would be impacting queue times is the fact it's Ascension, which has been occurring quite often in the RGMQ since the legacy client was disabled. People have just gotten sick of it to the point there's significantly less people queuing for it, increasing queue times as a result.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=g9xTc68M,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2017-07-31T00:33:04.083+0000)
>
> Probably something else that would be impacting queue times is the fact it's Ascension, which has been occurring quite often in the RGMQ since the legacy client was disabled. People have just gotten sick of it to the point there's significantly less people queuing for it, increasing queue times as a result.

Let's not forget that Ascension is utter shit and no one likes it. Fact RIot keeps forcing it on everyone isn't helping.

I wouldn't say it's "sh!t" and that "no one likes it". There are plenty of people who like it and think it's a great mode (I'm among them), but having it in the queue so often just takes the fun away, and makes it more tedious than anything else.

I guess, from now until I hit level 30 I'll be playing with a mate(I usually do, but I wanted to sneak in a match last night to get my daily win bonus), at least then there's a guarantee of at least 1 decent person on my team. 
All I really want to do with this account though is to just get enough IP to buy a summoner name change, as I already have the 'DIV1D3' account on NA, and want to transfer it over here to OCE, but I'll have to change names before I do that. 

It just seemed outrageous to me how after a solid hour of searching for an Ascended match, I got nothing, and then just after it took 12 minutes to fetch an ARAM match. 
The queue times when I first started on NA were pretty close to what was estimated, though that was almost always Co-Op vs AI.
there is hope for queue times :)
